dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1233 IH: To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of Federal funds for disinformation research grants, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Massie (for himself, Mr. Biggs of Arizona, Ms. Boebert, Mr. Burlison, Mr. Davidson, Mr. Gosar, Ms. Greene of Georgia, Mr. Ogles, Mr. Perry, Mr. Roy, and Mr. Weber of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To prohibit the obligation or expenditure of Federal funds for disinformation research grants, and for other purposes.

section.text: No Federal funds may be obligated or expended by any Federal department or agency for the following:

paragraph.text: Programs within the National Science Foundationâ€™s Track F: Trust and Authenticity in Communications Systems.
